program.name: dejagnu
program.build:
gmake pkgdatadir="${_datadir}"
sed "s!@datadir@!${_datadir}!g" runtest >/tmp/$$ cp /tmp/$$ runtest && rm -f /tmp/$$ sed "s!@datadir@!${_datadir}!g" runtest.exp >/tmp/$$ cp /tmp/$$ runtest.exp && rm -f /tmp/$$

item.para: New XML output option, so test results can be loaded into a database
Test cases build with either GCC 2.x or 3.x
BlueGnu has been removed from the contrib directory
The contrib/test* scipts were bitrotten and have been removed. If you still want copies of these, they can be found in the previous DejaGnu release.
